description.value: At 8th level, you can change your shape for a number of rounds per day equal to your wizard level. These rounds do not need to be consecutive. This ability otherwise functions like @Compendium[pf1.spells.774kmgcb7ygviht0]{Beast Shape II} or @Compendium[pf1.spells.pawbnw1nm4f0b98e]{Elemental Body I}. At 12th level, this ability functions like @Compendium[pf1.spells.w88ddxpu89qcr5c0]{Beast Shape III} or @Compendium[pf1.spells.yldjnorgbx4jsldz]{Elemental Body II}.
